pageProduct.name: Ostelin Bone Strength + Magnesium 120 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Information

Why Bone Strength matters

Reaching peak bone mass

Strong bones are essential for quality of life, as bones provide the structure for our bodies*. Peak bone mass is reached in our 20s**, but no matter your age, it will make a difference to make decisions that support long-term bone strength. Consuming enough vitamin D and calcium is one way to achieve this.

*Better Health Channel. Bones. 2012

**Mitchell PJ et al. Life-course approach to nutrition. Osteoporos Int. 2015, 26(12), 2723 2742

Bone Strength Magnesium

1 in 3 Australians don't meet adequate magnesium intake from food sources. Ostelin Bone Strength Magnesium provides key nutrients that maintain bone strength, plus magnesium to relieve muscle cramps when dietary intake is inadequate. It supports muscle relaxation and reduce muscle tiredness when dietary magnesium intake is inadequate.

Dosage for Adults: Take 2 tablets daily with a meal or as directed by your healthcare professional.

Ostelin Bone Strength Magnesium Product Benefits

Contains magnesium to support muscle relaxation and reduce muscle tiredness (when dietary intake is inadequate).

Contains vitamin D3, an important nutrient as it maintains bone strength.

Relieves muscle cramps (when dietary intake of magnesium is inadequate).

No added gluten, lactose, dairy products, artificial flavours or sweeteners.

General Information

Maintain bone strength.
Supports muscle function.

• Ostelin Bone Strength + Magnesium provides key nutrients that maintain bone strength plus magnesium to relieve muscle cramps when dietary intake is inadequate.
• Supports muscle relaxation and reduces muscle tiredness when dietary magnesium intake is inadequate.
• Vitamin D3 is a key nutrient as it maintains bone strength.

Size: 120 Tablets

KEY FEATURES

• Contains calcium and vitamin D3: To maintain bone strength
• Contains magnesium: To relieve muscle cramps (when dietary intake is inadequate)
• Other product benefits: Supports muscle relaxation and reduces muscle tiredness (when dietary intake of magnesium is inadequate)
• Dosage: Take 2 tablets daily with a meal or as directed by your healthcare professional
• This medicine may not be right for you. Read the warnings before purchase, in warnings section below. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.

Warnings

Contains soya.

Ingredients

Calcium (from Calcium carbonate) 165mg
Magnesium (from Magnesium citrate nonahydrate) 25mg
Magnesium (from heavy Magnesium oxide) 25mg
Colecalciferol (Vitamin D3 500IU) 12.5micrograms
Menaquinone7 (Vitamin K2) 35micrograms

Contains: NO ADDED: Gluten, lactose, artificial flavours, artificial sweeteners, artificial preservatives, or dairy products.

Contains soya.

Halal certified.

Directions

For adults: take 2 tablets daily with a meal or as directed by your healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.
Protect from moisture.
